backend/main.mo: Main canister logic providing user profiles, earning items, claims, transactions, VIP status, balances, and authorization checks.
backend/migration.mo: Defines legacy actor data model and a stubbed migration function for future state migration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high-level feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend components, hooks, and utilities across the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata and loading the main React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component rendering the app shell with theme provider and toaster.
frontend/src/components/AlternateView.ts: Empty placeholder component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/CopyField.tsx: Reusable component for displaying and copying values with optional masking for sensitive fields.
Empty placeholder component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/exchange/Deposit: Form for creating deposit requests, validating inputs, converting amounts to smallest units, and submitting via createDeposit.
frontend/src/components/exchange/Exchang: Header with navigation tabs that conditionally shows admin pages and includes login controls.
frontend/src/components/exchange/Markets: Displays market prices with markup, showing reference and exchange prices plus 24h change with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/exchange/pages/A: Admin interface for managing deposit addresses and marking deposits or withdrawals as completed.
frontend/src/components/exchange/pages/M: Renders the markets page showing real‑time cryptocurrency prices using MarketsTable.
frontend/src/components/exchange/pages/S: Displays exchange settings and renders the pricing settings form.
frontend/src/components/exchange/pages/T: Requires login to trade and shows trade ticket and trade history once authenticated.
Provides deposit addresses, deposit/withdrawal forms, and transfer history, requiring login to access.
frontend/src/components/exchange/pages/W: Wallet view requiring login and showing balances and recent activity.
frontend/src/components/exchange/Pricing: Admin form to view and adjust pricing markup via slider or numeric input and save it.
frontend/src/components/exchange/Simulat: Static alert explaining that all deposits and withdrawals are manually processed by admin.
frontend/src/components/exchange/TradeHi: Shows user trade history by mapping and sorting trades, with formatted amounts and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/exchange/TradeTi: Form for placing buy or sell market orders, computing amounts, validating inputs, and submitting trades.
frontend/src/components/exchange/Transfe: Displays combined deposit and withdrawal history with statuses, references, and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/exchange/WalletA: Displays recent deposits, withdrawals, and trades by combining and sorting activity data, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/exchange/WalletB: Shows available balances for all supported assets with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/exchange/Withdra: Provides a form to create withdrawal requests, validating balances and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/ExchangeAppShell: Main layout controlling navigation, authentication checks, admin gating, and rendering pages with loading states.
frontend/src/components/KeyToolsAppShell: App shell for Bitcoin WIF tools with header, security notice, generator, verifier, and educational sections.
frontend/src/components/KeyToolsHeader.t: Sticky header displaying app title and a link to external documentation.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow with loading states and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter a name and save their profile with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/SecurityNotice.t: Security warnings describing key-generation safety and user responsibility.
frontend/src/components/taskora/pages/Ad: Admin interface for managing USDT addresses and approving or rejecting deposits, withdrawals, claims, and VIP upgrades.
frontend/src/components/taskora/pages/Da: Displays account summary, VIP status, earnings stats, and recent user activity.
frontend/src/components/taskora/pages/Ea: Shows earning tasks and allows users to submit reward claims with proof and messages.
frontend/src/components/taskora/pages/Tr: Handles USDT deposits and withdrawals and shows transfer history with status indicators.
frontend/src/components/taskora/pages/Vi: Displays current VIP tier and allows users to request upgrades with tier benefit details.
frontend/src/components/WifGenerator.tsx: Generates random Bitcoin WIF keys and displays the WIF, public key, and address with copy fields.
frontend/src/components/WifVerifier.tsx: Verifies a user‑entered WIF key and derives its public key and address, showing validity and details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useExchangeQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating exchange state, deposits, withdrawals, and trades using an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity React context and login/logout handling using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketPrices.ts: Fetches and caches crypto market prices from CoinGecko with periodic refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/usePricingMarkup.ts: Manages local pricing markup with storage persistence and a helper to apply markup to prices.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profile fetching, saving, and admin checks via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useRewardQueries.ts: Queries and mutations for reward-related data like account summaries, activity, earning items, and claims.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with light/dark theme variables and custom animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/bitcoinWif.ts: Implements Base58, Base58Check, hashing, and placeholder key utilities for Bitcoin WIF handling.
frontend/src/utils/getErrorMessage.ts: Maps various error messages to user-friendly strings and falls back to generic errors for unknown inputs.
frontend/src/utils/shareLink.ts: Empty utility file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin extensions.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, scope notes, issues, and feature history for the Taskora Global build.
